title: Allow query parameters passed to Schema Browser
description: For restricting the amount of documents used for schema analysis (inside solr's Luke and the Schema Browser pages), it would be very helpful allowing the user to pass in a query request parameter (q) for specifying a lucene query which would first be executed before the schema browsing starts.

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
Schema browser is redesigned and optimized in 4.x, won't fix this in 3.x now. Closing
